name: mesocolon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the part of the mesentery (= the membrane that connects the bowel to the back wall of the abdomen) concerned with the large bowel: the transverse mesocolon Mesenteric cysts are most frequently located in the small bowel mesentery and mesocolon.
